about_the_game:
The official version will include: [/h2]
  • · 2-4 people online
  • Endless mode
  • Numerous challenging tasks
  • mecha system
  • Multiple roles to choose from
  • More weapons, auxiliary weapons, airdrop types, enhancement chips, etc.

Introducing Greedland: A Top-Down Shooter for Fans of "Vampire Survivors" and Beyond
EPIC BATTLES WITH MASSIVE ENEMY WAVES
Powered by Unreal Engine 5, "Greedland" delivers finely crafted enemies that swarm you from every direction, igniting an adrenaline-fueled gaming experience.

BUILD YOUR ULTIMATE WARRIOR

Unlock a vast array of potent weapons and skills to create satisfying battle combinations and relive the thrill of classic games like "Alien Shooter."


EXPLORE AN EXTENSIVE ARSENAL

Choose from dozens of primary and secondary weapons, along with a long list of skills, offering endless strategic possibilities. Look forward to operating powerful mechs in future updates!

DIVERSE MAPS AND CHALLENGING FOES

Experience three distinct maps, each with unique enemy combinations and varying difficulty levels, including formidable boss battles.

CONTINUOUSLY EXPANDING CONTENT

As an Early Access title, Greedland is always growing, with new maps, game modes, mechs, and a 4-player co-op option coming soon.





Add Greedland to your wishlist now and stay tuned for exciting updates and fresh content. Immerse yourself in a thrilling top-down shooter adventure like no other!

content_descriptors.notes: There is bloody content in the game.

name: Greedland Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Core i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 960
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Core i7
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce RTX 2060
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: Welcome to Greedland, an exhilarating top-down shooter where you play as an interstellar mercenary. Battle through ever-changing environments and annihilate waves of enemies. If you enjoy the action-packed gameplay of Crimsonland and Vampire Survivors,Greedland is the perfect game for you!
supported_languages:
English, Simplified Chinese*, Traditional Chinese*
*languages with full audio support
